author: jkuhnert
msg: The documented usage of PageAttachListener stated that page properties should be restored before the listener is called. Modified logic so that RequestCycle calls firePageAttached directly and removed the firePageAttached call within AbstractPage.attach

author: erodriguez
msg: Removed handlers' dependency on StartupConfiguration in preparation for moving LDAP protocol provider to LdapConfiguration:
o  Changed handlers to implement MINA MessageHandler.

author: erodriguez
msg: Updated Kerberos protocol provider to lazy-load initial context, fixing issue requiring search base DN to exist at protocol provider startup.
